trans-unit.source: Provides access to mobile service-specific resources for use in a custom API defined in <token>firstref_zumo</token>
trans-unit.target: Provides access to mobile service-specific resources for use in a custom API defined in <token>firstref_zumo</token>

trans-unit.source: This object contains the following members:
trans-unit.target: This object contains the following members:

trans-unit.source: The following properties of the mobile service instance are exposed for use in a custom API.
trans-unit.target: The following properties of the mobile service instance are exposed for use in a custom API.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the <link xlink:href="45a47dd8-5bad-4472-83d8-07cf0582b652" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">mssql object</link>, which is used to send Transact-SQL queries to tables in a mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Returns an instance of the <link xlink:href="45a47dd8-5bad-4472-83d8-07cf0582b652" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">mssql object</link>, which is used to send Transact-SQL queries to tables in a mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the <link xlink:href="6b744bfe-b5a7-445f-bb4f-cf49fd45f952" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">push object</link>, which is used to send push notifications to clients.
trans-unit.target: Returns an instance of the <link xlink:href="6b744bfe-b5a7-445f-bb4f-cf49fd45f952" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">push object</link>, which is used to send push notifications to clients.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <embeddedLabel>Get started with push notifications</embeddedLabel> (<externalLink><linkText>Windows Store</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=262671</linkUri></externalLink>/<externalLink target="_blank"><linkText>Windows Phone</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=268720</linkUri></externalLink>/<externalLink><linkText>iOS</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=272732</linkUri></externalLink>/<externalLink><linkText>Android</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=280128</linkUri></externalLink>).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <embeddedLabel>Get started with push notifications</embeddedLabel> (<externalLink><linkText>Windows Store</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=262671</linkUri></externalLink>/<externalLink target="_blank"><linkText>Windows Phone</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=268720</linkUri></externalLink>/<externalLink><linkText>iOS</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=272732</linkUri></externalLink>/<externalLink><linkText>Android</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=280128</linkUri></externalLink>).

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the <link xlink:href="aeb95a92-5727-494c-8d54-e222a1798b9f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">tables object</link>, which is used to access and change data in mobile service tables.
trans-unit.target: Returns an instance of the <link xlink:href="aeb95a92-5727-494c-8d54-e222a1798b9f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">tables object</link>, which is used to access and change data in mobile service tables.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="c5e3e373-5d6e-462e-a5c9-1920ef1d538d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Read and write data</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="c5e3e373-5d6e-462e-a5c9-1920ef1d538d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Read and write data</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: In a custom API HTTP method export implementation, an instance of the <link xlink:href="d38653e9-b904-4b6e-9595-1587acdc8eca" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">service object</link> is obtained from the <legacyLink xlink:href="6f77cfad-b160-447b-b170-c62e6987d819" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">request object</legacyLink>
trans-unit.target: In a custom API HTTP method export implementation, an instance of the <link xlink:href="d38653e9-b904-4b6e-9595-1587acdc8eca" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">service object</link> is obtained from the <legacyLink xlink:href="6f77cfad-b160-447b-b170-c62e6987d819" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">request object</legacyLink>
